message: I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to own a product that has been carefully crafted with attention to detail. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. The price for this product is $10000, a steal considering its quality and uniqueness. I'm sure you'll find it's worth every penny. What do you say? Will you take it off my hands?
